snippet.title: Mid-air cable car crash strands 100 passengers above river
snippet.content: One hundred passengers have been stranded above a river due to a cable car accident on a sky-way in Germany. The gondola, which carries people across the River Rhine in Cologne, was stopped on Sunday after a car hit a pillar. Fire crews have used a crane and a winch to rescue the stranded passengers. Pictures posted to social media show children and adults being lowered to waiting boats, and strapped in with firefighters. No injuries have been reported. (C) Nine Digital Pty Ltd 2017
